participant_1.background:
When i shower my skin is nearly red from how hard i scrub.
I still love my cat despite all this.
I have horrible allergies.
I spend an hour getting ready in the morning.
I can t stand clutter or dust.

participant_2.background:
I love to read.
I started collaborating with some popular publishers.
I have none to share my thoughts about the books i read.
I started a small blog lately to post reviews.

content.text: Hello, do you like books?
Yes, I love books! I have been reading since I was a child.
That's great! I love reading too. I read an hour every day.
Wow, that's a lot of reading! I can't read that much, but I try to read as much as I can.
I love reading books about history and science. What kinds of books do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy.
Those are great genres! I've read some really good historical fiction books.
Me too! I recently read a book about the French Revolution that was really good.
I've always wanted to read a book about the French Revolution. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It was really good.
What are some of your favorite fantasy books?
I love the Harry Potter series! I also like the Lord of the Rings series and the Narnia series.
Those are all great books! I've read all of them.
Me too! I've read them all multiple times.
I'm glad to hear that we have similar interests in books.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who loves to read.
I agree! Maybe we can exchange book recommendations sometime.
That would be great! I'd love to hear your recommendations.
I'll have to start writing them down.
Okay, sounds good!
